mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board( board_id, board_title, board_contents, board_category, member_mail ) values ( #{board_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_contents}, #{board_category}, #{member_mail} )
mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_contents, m.member_name, b.board_category, b.create_time, b.edit_time, b.hit from board b join member m on (b.member_mail = m.member_mail) where b.board_category = #{board_category}

select b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_contents, b.member_mail, m.member_name, b.board_category, b.create_time, b.edit_time, b.hit from board b join member m on (b.member_mail = m.member_mail) where b.board_id = #{board_id}
